article.title: Status and history for [mkd]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: replaced the erroneous occurrences LATIN and GREEK characters with their CYRILLIC look-alike; thanks to Arthur Reutenauer for providing this update.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
